userreviews.userReview: Fantastic philosophical book which you read it again and again , and each time you find out new points. I hope all grown ups read this book to remember the simple way of living,loving and being loved.
This book is my whole childhood , it remember's me myself as a mini bookworm. It's my favorite of the whole books, and I might have read it a lot of times
All time favorite
"What is essential to the heart is invisible to the eye."The Fox is my favorite character.
Le Petit Prince, is not just a children's book. Adults can read and enjoy it as well. It's philosophic. Filled with beauty and melancholy.

Câu chuyện giản dị và thật thần tiên. Ước gì một ngày nào đó, trong đêm trăng mềm mịn, khi bộ hành trong sa mạc hoang vắng, âm thanh cũng không, tiếng động cũng không, chỉ thấy êm ả và mềm mịn, tôi có thể được gặp em, "ông Hoàng bé nhỏ". Khi thành người lớn rồi, đôi khi đầu óc bị mê muội bởi những toan tính hay những đam mê chẳng để làm gì. Tôi mong sẽ luôn nhớ về em, để trở nên hiểu chuyện theo cách của một thiên thần nhỏ. Bởi vì, những điều quan trọng và vô giá nhất trên đời, ta lại chẳng có thể nhìn thấy bằng đôi mắt, ta chỉ có thể thấy bằng trái tim thôi. Những điều hạnh phúc sẽ luôn làm tim ta nhảy mừng như được tưới thứ nước mát trong kì diệu.Mong được gặp em, tại một đêm trên sa mạc. Tôi sẽ viết thư cho tác giả rằng em đã trở lại. Tôi hứa đó.

This book teaches me quite many things about this life. The cute prince made me think of what I am living for ?? which is my own rose ?? This world is very and very complicated . People have a lot of ways to live ...Some just only know for themselves , some are too "hợm hĩnh" :3 and some live for others ,..We can choose which one is the best for us ..... To be honestly , I read it a long time ago and I think i should read it again ><

The majority of the reviews here have confused this book with the actual story The Little Prince. This counts to 5 using elements of that story. It’s a nice primer, but it seems too short compared to most other counting primers that at least go to 10.
Terriblement frais
Review menyusul.
As delightful as the first time I read it

Il est incroyable de voir comment ce roman est riche d'enseignements anachronique de la vie, que nous devons nous rappeler de temps en temps.(It is amazing how this novel has anachronical lessons for life, that we should remember time to time.)"Il eût mieux valu revenir à la même heure, dit le renard. Si tu viens, par exemple, à quatre heures de l'après-midi, dés trois heures je commencerai d'être heureux. Plus l'heure avancera, plus je me sentirai heureux. À quatre heures, déjà, je m'agiterai et m'inquiéterai; je découvrirai le prix du bonheur! Mais si tu viens n'importe quand, je ne saurai jamais à quelle heure m'habiller le cœur... il faut des rites."

I readn this book in 6th grade because it was the last book on my teachers shelf for reading time, and im so happy it was. Personallly i am so fond of this book. It gives you a perspective on life and living in general too. It also teaches you about love, friendship, and death. I read the english translation version of this book because obviously i cant speak french let alone read it. Despite this book having pictures, the illistration is beautifull and quirky at the same time yet a little depressing. You will fall in love with this little boy-La Petite Prince.

Buku ini sekilas seperti cerita anak anak dengan iluatrasi lucu namun, cerita yang disajikan luar biasa dan dapat direnungkan oleh orang dewasa. Lewat cerita seorang anak yang mengamati dunia dengan mata naif dan lugu, Saint Exupery menyentuh beberapa nilai dan pengalaman manusia yang paling dasar; KEKUASAAN, TANGGUNG JAWAB, dan CINTA. Dongeng yang mengharukan sekaligus amat mendalam...termasuk karya karya agung sastra dunia yang tidak terlupakan.

I was going to buy this book, the bookshop keeper said this book is for kids not grownups. After reading it, I have to say that it's for grownups as much as it's for kids. It teaches kids to be wary of the adults biased perspectives and teaches adults to not limit kids imagination by imposing their (adults) ways of seeing the world.

Regalo de Quimera, me encantó y me produjo ganas de leer los otros libros de Antoine de Saint-Exupéry porque me apena confesar que sólo conozco "El Principito", pero los buscaré. ¡Muchas gracias Quime!
un livre pour moi un puis .. Je ne sais pas!
